column5: Makes me wish I lived 500 miles North...   Art
Makes me want to run down to the beer store and buy a case of Canadian.
You're right Mike...a really good commercial.   Hell Mike, I don't need that much motivation. Just the prospect of a slight breeze or even an overcast sky is all I need.
I agree. The marketing gurus at Molson's are genius's.    A man after my own heart.
I went to get a 6 pack of canadian cans yesterday and the lady at the till told me that the tall boys are cheaper for some reason. $12.83 or something for reg cans and $12 even for tall boys.
Actually the U.S.A. is the best country....after all 20 million illegal aliens can't be wrong...Eh...
Sorry BB, But are illegal aliens are aloud to collect welfare. Making us the greatest country in the world.
And where do you think they learned it from....from their southern cousins of course...
Did not know that. I stand corrected.
